dagtex 0.1.0
  • Reference

Add text to an edge.

annotate_edge.Rd

Add text to an edge.

annotate_edge(
  text,
  placement = "midway",
  position = "above",
  size = "normalsize",
  color = NULL
)

Arguments

text

Text to add to the DAG.
placement

Character, describes where along the edge to place the annotation. Defaults to "midway", other options include "near start", "at end", etc. (see TikZ documentation).
position

"above", "below", or "" for positioning text on top of the edge.
size

Font size, to LaTex. Defaults to "normalsize", other options are "footnotesize", "LARGE", etc.
color

TExt color of annotation

Examples

dagtex() %>%
add_many_nodes(c("A", "B")) %>%
add_edge("A", "B", annotate = annotate_edge("example"))


dagtex() %>%
add_many_nodes(c("A", "B")) %>%
add_edge("A", "B",
annotate = annotate_edge("example", color = "teal", size = "tiny",
position = "very near start", placement = ""))
